text: kavurun dænumak nomætiva mōḍakamin tamangē daruvanva marā dæmuvōda ovunda, ovunṭa allāh tamanṭa (āhārayaṭa gænīmaṭa) labā dī tibuṇu (hon̆da) dæya (anumata nætæyi) allāh mata boru gotā vaḷakvā dæmuvōda ovunda, niyata vaśayenma pāḍuvak at kara gatha. (ebævin) ovun niyata vaśayenma napuru mārgayehima giyaha. ṛju mārgayehi giya aya novannāha
